name: Wagner and the 3rd light - Episode 1
description:
Wagner and the Third Light is a lighthearted adventure game that takes place in a small port town in England in the late 1980s.

Play as Wagner Mary Hugo P.I. (shadowed by his trusted side kick, a filing cabinet called Phil), who is tasked - by the insurance firm Fishermans Widows- to investigate the recent shipwreck of The Bolena. Delve into conversations with the main characters of this coastal town, and let the game introduce you to a potentially story where not everything is as it looks.

The game was developed in 6 days for the Adventure Game Jam 2016 by Manos Agianniotakis, Jameela Khan and Claudio Pollina.
